42945.name: Percent of gender gap 1980 (Blau and Kahn (2017))
42945.description: Blau and Kahn (2017) decompose the gender wage gap into the contribution of particular labor-market characteristics. Specifically, it shows the fraction of the total gender wage gap accounted for by gender differences for the full specification of variables, based on the Oaxacaâ€“Blinder decomposition.
42945.datasetName: Decomposition of Gender Wage Gap 1980 - Blau and Kahn (2017)

source.name: Blau and Kahn (2017)
source.dataPublishedBy: Blau, Francine D., and Lawrence M. Kahn (2017). "The Gender Wage Gap: Extent, Trends, and Explanations." Journal of Economic Literature, 55(3): 789-865.
source.dataPublisherSource: Blau and Kahn's calculations based on data from the PSID (Michigan Panel Study of Income Dynamics)
source.additionalInfo: See the authors' data appendix for more detail on how the data was prepared and analyzed.
